content:
I am an experienced web developer with over 5 years in the industry. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as back-end technologies including: Node.js, PHP and MySQL. I am proficient in using JavaScript frameworks (including React and Vue) for building modern, scalable web applications. I am also experienced in using version control systems such as Git and in Unix server administration.

In addition to my technical qualifications, I am both comfortable and experienced in liaising with clients and customers and have a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science and Psychology. I am always looking for opportunities to learn and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in web development and often refer to the Technology Radar for inspiration.
